description: TETR.IO allows players to play a variant of Tetris either solo or against an opponent. After finishing a multiplayer game, a player can select SAVE REPLAY to save a replay of that game. The replay is saved as a TTRM file.
Each TTRM file contains JSON-formatted plain text data. This data specifies the users who played the game, the game's seed, the game's settings, and the inputs made during the game.
